p: The antioxidant activity of RPLO was determined using the DPPH radical scavenging assay. The antioxidant activity of RPLO was concentration-dependent, generating a dose-response curve. Table 2 shows the IC 50 values of RPLO and of the antioxidant Trolox, which was used as a reference antioxidant because it is an analog of vitamin E, a fat-soluble vitamin.
